amendment.description: To strike a provision providing $6 million to sugarcane growers in Hawaii, which was not included in the Administration's emergency supplemental request.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3617 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 104.

action.text: Amendment SA 3617 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S3544; text: CR S3544) To strike a provision providing $6 million to sugarcane growers in Hawaii, which was not included in the Administration's emergency supplemental request.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3617 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 104.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3617 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 104.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3617 proposed by Senator McCain.
